entry.title: Sunday night: Drizzle or rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy changing to drizzle this evening then to flurries before morning. Fog patches dissipating before morning. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind light except southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 over southern sections. Wind becoming northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 before morning. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:21 PM NST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Flurries. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries ending early in the afternoon then cloudy. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 4:21 PM NST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:21 PM NST Sunday 01 January 2023
